snippet: Jamie Donaldson of Wales won the Thailand Championship for his first title of the year, beating Clément Sordet of France and the defending champion, Lee Westwood of England, by three strokes at Amata Country Club in Chonburi.
abstract: Jamie Donaldson wins Thailand Championship, shooting 21-under 267 overall; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Donaldson of Wales won the Thailand Championship for his first title of the year, beating Clément Sordet of France and the defending champion, Lee Westwood of England, by three strokes at Amata Country Club in Chonburi.

headline.main: Donaldson Rallies to Win in Thailand
headline.print_headline: Donaldson Rallies to Win in Thailand
